NEW.loz: Akzentz is always releasing new and featured nail products and they’re sure to impress! Inspired by the latest nail styles, our new products are designed to support your skills and creativity to help you create amazing nails.
NEW.sades-m: Science and beauty combine to bring you the New Trinity Shades Collection, available In Trinity Shades Cool SC1 Natural SN1 and Warm SW1
NEW.voyage-m: Introducing the Luxio Voyage collection. Escape to a luxurious destination with six new Luxio shades: Lustful, Glimpse, Jaded, Instinct , Persuasion and Virtue
NEW.fascination-m: Introducing the Luxio Fascination collection. Escape to a luxurious destination with six new Luxio shades: Impulse, Storm, Beguiling, Tantauzing , Plush and Curiosity
NEW.rendezvous-m: Introducing Luxio Rendezvous, a range of shades inspired by the excitement and allure of a romantic rendezvous. New Luxio Sentiment, Luxio Secret, Luxio Sultry, Luxio Provoke, Luxio Tryst and Luxio Cryptic
NEW.miami-m: Introducing a new range of shimmering, shifting glitters inspired by the dreamy colours of retro Miami Beach. New Gel Play Miami Glitter Shifter collection: Heat, Night and Sunset

RULES.title: GET YOUR PERSONAL ID
RULES.title2: Important information for using the online store
RULES.rule-1: LUXIO is for professional use only and is not available to individuals
RULES.rule-2: To confirm your professional / business status and get an ID, please fill out an application form on our website
RULES.rule-2-li-1: If you are the owner of a salon business, provide the details of the legal entity
RULES.rule-2-li-2: If you are a master of nail service, please provide a diploma
RULES.rule-3: Your application will be reviewed within one business day
RULES.rule-4: The online store is available only for authorized users with a PERSONAL ID

LUXIO.main: LUXIO GEL is a 100% gel that provides a durable, long-lasting, beautiful finish, protects the nail from external damage and gives a bright glossy shine!
LUXIO.list-4: Safe and easy removal by dissolving with liquid Akzentz Soak Off

CONTACT.message-1: Send us your comments, questions, or concerns
CONTACT.message-2: Find us on your favorite social media platform
